tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_management (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    production_date DATE,
    component_name VARCHAR(255),
    component_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT NOT NULL,
    part_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    ship_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE robots (
    robot_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    robot_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturing_date DATE,
    production_line_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE,
    component_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    delivery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Robots(
	r_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	robot_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
	model_number VARCHAR(20),
	production_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE Parts(
	p_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	part_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	part_number VARCHAR(20),
	quantity_in_stock INT,
	unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Assemblies(
	a_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	assembly_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	assembly_number VARCHAR(20),
	quantity_available INT,
	last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers(
	s_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	supplier_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	contact_person VARCHAR(50),
	phone_number VARCHAR(15),
	email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Orders(
	o_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	part_id INT,
	supplier_id INT,
	quantity_ordered INT,
	order_date DATE
);
